name: 1NNOCENT
description:
1nnocent is a third-person shooter based on the Battle Royale genre, in which a reality show is simulated where people must survive each other to emerge victorious and win a cash prize and forgiveness for their crimes committed.

Develop by a team of 5 students of game development in São Paulo, Brazil, 1NNOCENT have as the objetic to deliver a weak protagonist, that has never been in a gun fight or even helded a gun, trying to survive you gonna encounter  a maze, that will defie your survival insticts.

THE GAME STILL IS IN DEVELOPMENT, expect find bugs and anothers things that may can maybe disturb the game experience.
